id: New Jersey mother credited with foiling an alleged school shooting
paragraph: Koeberle Bull received a Facebook message threatening her kids from a stranger in Kentucky. She reported the message to the authorities, and when the police confronted 20-year-old Dylan Jarrell last week in his driveway, he was armed with a gun and more than 200 rounds of ammunition.Oct. 24, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
